data.content:
Sejuani: The Winter's Wrath

Release Date: January 17, 2012

Sejuani, also known as the Winter's Wrath, is a powerful and resilient champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her icy abilities and commanding presence, she has become a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into Sejuani's story, her strengths and weaknesses, her background in the game, and her significant role in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Sejuani

Sejuani hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with icy tundras and warring tribes. Born into the Winter's Claw tribe, Sejuani was raised to be a fierce warrior, embodying the strength and resilience of her people. From a young age, she displayed exceptional leadership skills and a determination to unite the tribes of the Freljord under her banner.

Sejuani's ultimate goal is to bring about a new era of strength and unity in the Freljord. She believes that only through ruthless conquest and the eradication of weakness can her people truly thrive. With her trusty boar companion, Bristle, by her side, Sejuani sets out to prove herself as the rightful leader of the Freljord.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Sejuani possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make her a formidable champion in the game. Her primary strength lies in her ability to initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team with her crowd control abilities. Her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, can freeze multiple enemies in place, allowing her team to follow up with devastating attacks.

Furthermore, Sejuani's passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and damage reduction, making her incredibly tanky and difficult to take down. This allows her to dive into the heart of the enemy team and soak up damage while her allies deal the finishing blows.

However, Sejuani does have her weaknesses. Her early game can be challenging, as she relies heavily on her abilities to deal damage and initiate fights. Without proper coordination with her team, she can struggle to secure kills and make an impact in the early stages of the game.

Additionally, Sejuani's reliance on crowd control makes her vulnerable to champions with high mobility or the ability to cleanse or negate crowd control effects. Champions like Yasuo or Morgana can prove to be difficult matchups for Sejuani, as they can easily dodge or nullify her crowd control abilities.

Sejuani in the Game

Sejuani is primarily played in the jungle role, where she excels at initiating fights and providing crowd control for her team. Her ability to engage and lock down multiple enemies makes her a valuable asset in team fights and objective control.

Her playstyle revolves around setting up opportunities for her team to secure kills and objectives. With her Q ability, Arctic Assault, she charges forward, knocking up and damaging enemies in her path. This can be followed up with her W ability, Winter's Wrath, which deals damage to nearby enemies and applies a stack of Frost, increasing the damage of her next ability or basic attack.

Sejuani's E ability, Permafrost, is a powerful crowd control ability that deals damage and stuns enemies affected by Frost. This ability synergizes well with her passive, as it allows her to apply Frost to multiple enemies and then detonate it for maximum impact.

Finally, Sejuani's ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is a game-changer. She throws her flail in a line, stunning the first enemy hit and then freezing all nearby enemies in a large area. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and secure crucial objectives like Dragon or Baron Nashor.

Sejuani's Skins

Sejuani has a variety of skins available, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist to her character. On our website, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Sejuani's skins, allowing you to choose the perfect look for your Winter's Wrath.

Some notable skins for Sejuani include:

  • Traditional Sejuani
  • Bear Cavalry Sejuani
  • Beast Hunter Sejuani
  • Poro Rider Sejuani
  • Firecracker Sejuani

Each skin brings its own unique flair to Sejuani's appearance, allowing players to customize their champion to their liking.

Conclusion

Sejuani, the Winter's Wrath, is a powerful and resilient champion in League of Legends. With her icy abilities and commanding presence, she dominates the battlefield and leads her tribe with unwavering determination. Her strengths lie in her ability to initiate team fights and provide crowd control, while her weaknesses stem from her reliance on coordination and vulnerability to crowd control negation.

Whether you choose to charge into battle atop her trusty boar, Bristle, or ride into battle on a Poro, Sejuani offers a unique and exciting gameplay experience. Explore our website to discover all of Sejuani's skins and unleash the full power of the Winter's Wrath!

Sejuani (Darkrider Sejuani)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: January 17, 2012

Darkrider Sejuani is a fearsome skin for the champion Sejuani in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on January 17, 2012, and has since become a favorite among players for its unique design and thematic elements.

The Darkrider Sejuani skin transforms the icy warrior into a menacing figure, clad in dark armor and riding a terrifying boar. The skin features a dark color palette, with black and purple hues dominating the design. Sejuani's armor is adorned with spikes and intricate details, giving her a more aggressive and intimidating appearance.

One of the standout features of the Darkrider Sejuani skin is her mount, Bristle. In this skin, Bristle is transformed into a demonic boar, complete with glowing red eyes and fiery hooves. The boar's armor matches Sejuani's, creating a cohesive and visually striking duo.

Darkrider Sejuani also comes with unique visual and sound effects. Her abilities have been modified to fit the dark theme of the skin. For example, her Q ability, Arctic Assault, leaves behind a trail of dark energy as she charges forward. Her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, now summons a dark ice prison that shatters upon impact, adding an extra layer of visual impact to her gameplay.

Sejuani, the champion behind the Darkrider Sejuani skin, is a powerful and resilient tank in the game. She hails from the Freljord, a harsh and icy region in the League of Legends universe. Sejuani is the leader of the Winter's Claw, a tribe of warriors who value strength and survival above all else.

Sejuani's strengths lie in her ability to initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge into the fray, knocking up and damaging enemies in her path. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, deals area-of-effect damage and applies a frost debuff to enemies, slowing them down and making them vulnerable to her other abilities.

One of Sejuani's signature abilities is her E ability, Permafrost. This ability allows her to detonate the frost debuff applied by her W, dealing damage and stunning enemies in the area. It's a powerful tool for crowd control and can turn the tide of team fights in Sejuani's favor.

Sejuani's ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is a game-changer. She throws her flail in a line, stunning the first enemy hit and creating a large ice prison upon impact. The ice prison explodes after a short delay, damaging and stunning all enemies caught within its radius. This ability can single-handedly initiate team fights and lock down priority targets, making Sejuani a force to be reckoned with.

Despite her strengths, Sejuani does have some weaknesses. She lacks mobility compared to other champions, making her vulnerable to kiting and crowd control. Additionally, her damage output is not as high as some other tanks, so she relies heavily on her team to follow up on her initiations and capitalize on her crowd control abilities.

In the lore of League of Legends, Sejuani has a rich backstory. She was born into the Winter's Claw tribe and quickly rose through the ranks, becoming their leader. Sejuani is driven by a desire to unite the Freljord under her rule and believes that strength is the only path to survival in the harsh environment.

Sejuani's story is intertwined with other champions from the Freljord, such as Ashe and Lissandra. She has clashed with Ashe, the leader of the Avarosan tribe, multiple times, as their ideologies and visions for the Freljord clash. Sejuani sees Ashe as weak and believes that her leadership is holding back the true potential of the Freljord.

Throughout her journey, Sejuani has faced numerous challenges and obstacles. She has fought against the forces of the Frostguard, a group loyal to Lissandra, who seeks to bring about an eternal ice age. Sejuani's determination and strength have allowed her to overcome these challenges and continue her quest for dominance.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Sejuani, including the Darkrider Sejuani skin. Whether you're a fan of her icy origins or the menacing Darkrider skin, there's plenty to explore and enjoy about this formidable champion.

Sejuani (Sejuani Dawnchaser)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: January 14, 2016

Sejuani Dawnchaser is a stunning skin that brings a new level of fierceness and elegance to the Winter's Wrath herself, Sejuani. Released on January 14, 2016, this skin is a part of the Dawnbringer and Nightbringer skin line, which features champions in a celestial battle between light and darkness. Sejuani Dawnchaser is a representation of the Dawnbringer side, embodying the power of light and justice.

This skin transforms Sejuani into a radiant warrior, adorned with golden armor and wielding a majestic golden flail. Her boar, Bristle, is also given a celestial makeover, with glowing blue eyes and a shimmering white coat. The icy tundra of the Freljord is replaced with a celestial landscape, complete with floating islands and a vibrant sky filled with stars.

Sejuani Dawnchaser's abilities are also enhanced with stunning visual effects. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, leaves behind a trail of sparkling stardust as she charges forward. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, creates a burst of celestial energy with each swing of her flail. Her E ability, Permafrost, encases her enemies in shimmering ice crystals. And her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, summons a massive celestial ice crystal to freeze her foes in place.

Sejuani Dawnchaser is not only visually impressive but also adds a new layer of depth to Sejuani's character. The skin represents Sejuani's transformation into a champion of light, fighting against the forces of darkness. It showcases her determination and unwavering resolve to protect her people and bring justice to the world.

Sejuani, also known as the Winter's Wrath, is a powerful tank champion in League of Legends. Hailing from the icy lands of the Freljord, she is the leader of the Winter's Claw tribe and commands the loyalty of her fearsome war boar, Bristle. Sejuani is known for her relentless pursuit of power and her desire to unite the divided tribes of the Freljord under her rule.

Sejuani's strengths lie in her ability to initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge into the fray, knocking up and damaging enemies in her path. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, deals area-of-effect damage and applies a stack of Frost to enemies, which can be detonated with her E ability, Permafrost, to deal additional damage and slow them. Her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is a game-changing crowd control ability that can stun multiple enemies and set up devastating team fights.

However, Sejuani also has her weaknesses. She lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Her early game can be challenging, as she relies on scaling and itemization to become a formidable tank. Additionally, her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, has a long cooldown, so timing and accuracy are crucial for maximizing its impact.

In the lore of League of Legends, Sejuani has a rich backstory. She was born into the Winter's Claw tribe, a group of fierce warriors who value strength above all else. Sejuani's ambition and desire for power led her to challenge the current leader of the tribe, Ashe, in an attempt to claim leadership for herself. However, her coup failed, and she was exiled from the tribe.

During her exile, Sejuani encountered a mystical artifact known as the True Ice. This artifact granted her incredible power and transformed her into the fearsome warrior she is today. With her newfound strength, Sejuani returned to the Freljord and rallied the Winter's Claw tribe once again, vowing to unite the Freljord under her rule.

In the game, Sejuani is a popular pick in the jungle role, thanks to her ability to clear camps quickly and provide crowd control in ganks. Her tankiness and crowd control make her a valuable asset in team fights, where she can initiate and disrupt the enemy team. Sejuani's playstyle revolves around engaging fights and protecting her team, making her an excellent choice for players who enjoy a supportive and tanky playstyle.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Sejuani's various appearances, including her base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the celestial beauty of Sejuani Dawnchaser or the fierce warrior look of her other skins, you'll find everything you need to know about Sejuani's appearances right here.

Sejuani (Beast Hunter Sejuani)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: January 10, 2018

Beast Hunter Sejuani is a fearsome skin that transforms the Winter's Wrath into a formidable hunter of mythical creatures. Released on January 10, 2018, this skin offers a unique and exciting visual experience for players who enjoy playing as Sejuani, the Winter's Wrath.

Sejuani, the fearless leader of the Winter's Claw, is known for her icy demeanor and her relentless pursuit of power. With her trusty boar Bristle by her side, she roams the Freljord, seeking to unite the tribes under her banner. The Beast Hunter Sejuani skin embodies her determination and strength, showcasing her as a formidable hunter of mythical creatures.

The Beast Hunter Sejuani skin features a complete visual overhaul, transforming Sejuani into a fierce warrior ready to take on any challenge. Her armor is adorned with the pelts and bones of the creatures she has conquered, giving her a primal and intimidating appearance. Her weapon, the Winter's Wrath, is now a deadly spear with a jagged blade, perfect for taking down even the most formidable foes.

One of the standout features of the Beast Hunter Sejuani skin is the visual effects. Her abilities have been reimagined to match her new theme, with icy blue particles and animations that enhance the hunting aesthetic. When Sejuani charges into battle with her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, a massive ice crystal erupts from the ground, freezing her enemies in place. The attention to detail in the skin's visual effects truly brings the Beast Hunter Sejuani to life.

Aside from the visual enhancements, the Beast Hunter Sejuani skin also includes new sound effects and voice lines. Sejuani's voice has a more primal and commanding tone, reflecting her role as a hunter of mythical creatures. The sound effects for her abilities have been modified to match the skin's theme, further immersing players in the world of the Beast Hunter Sejuani.

Now, let's delve into the story of Sejuani and her place in the League of Legends. Sejuani hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land where tribes vie for power and survival. As the leader of the Winter's Claw, Sejuani seeks to unite the tribes under her rule, believing that only through strength and conquest can the Freljord thrive.

Sejuani's strength lies in her ability to initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and damage reduction, making her a formidable tank. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge into battle, knocking up and damaging enemies in her path. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, deals damage in an area around her and applies a stack of Frost to enemies, which can be consumed by her E ability, Permafrost, to deal additional damage and stun enemies.

Sejuani's ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is a game-changer in team fights. She throws her weapon, stunning the first enemy hit and creating a large ice explosion upon impact. This explosion freezes all nearby enemies, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks from Sejuani and her team.

While Sejuani excels in initiating fights and disrupting the enemy team, she does have some weaknesses. Her early game can be challenging, as she relies on levels and items to become a true threat. Additionally, her abilities have relatively long cooldowns, so timing and decision-making are crucial when playing Sejuani.

In the world of League of Legends, Sejuani is a popular pick in the jungle role. Her ability to initiate fights and lock down key targets makes her a valuable asset to any team. She thrives in team fights, where her crowd control and tankiness can turn the tide in her team's favor. However, she can also be played in the top lane as a tanky bruiser, utilizing her crowd control and durability to dominate her lane opponent.

If you're interested in learning more about Sejuani and her various appearances in the game, you can find information and videos on her champion page. Whether you prefer the classic Winter's Wrath or the fearsome Beast Hunter Sejuani, Sejuani offers a unique and exciting playstyle that is sure to keep you engaged on the Fields of Justice.

Sejuani (Firecracker Sejuani)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: January 28, 2016

Firecracker Sejuani is a stunning skin that brings a festive and explosive twist to the Freljordian warrior. Released on January 28, 2016, this skin is part of the Lunar Revel event, celebrating the Lunar New Year in the world of League of Legends. With its vibrant colors and thematic fireworks, Firecracker Sejuani is a must-have for fans of the champion.

The Story of Firecracker Sejuani

In the world of League of Legends, Firecracker Sejuani is a representation of Sejuani's celebration of the Lunar New Year. Embracing the spirit of the festival, Sejuani dons a stunning red and gold armor adorned with intricate firework designs. Her trusty boar, Bristle, also receives a festive makeover, with fiery red fur and golden accents.

As Sejuani charges into battle, her abilities are accompanied by dazzling fireworks, adding an extra layer of visual spectacle to her already powerful presence. From her icy flail to her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, every aspect of Firecracker Sejuani's design is carefully crafted to embody the explosive energy of the Lunar New Year.

Firecracker Sejuani is not only a visual delight but also a testament to the creativity and attention to detail of the skin design team at Riot Games. The skin perfectly captures the essence of the Lunar Revel event, bringing a touch of celebration and excitement to the battlefield.

Sejuani: The Winter's Wrath

Sejuani, also known as the Winter's Wrath, is a powerful tank champion in League of Legends. Hailing from the icy lands of the Freljord, she is the leader of the Winter's Claw tribe and a fierce warrior. Mounted on her loyal boar, Bristle, Sejuani charges into battle, freezing her enemies with her icy flail and disrupting their movements with her Glacial Prison ultimate.

Sejuani's strength lies in her ability to initiate team fights and soak up damage for her team. With her tankiness and crowd control abilities, she excels at engaging enemies and locking them down, allowing her teammates to follow up and secure kills. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and healing, making her even more durable in the heat of battle.

However, Sejuani does have her weaknesses. She lacks strong burst damage and relies heavily on her team to follow up on her initiations. Additionally, her mobility is limited, making her susceptible to kiting and crowd control. Skilled opponents can exploit these weaknesses and render Sejuani less effective in team fights.

In the lore of League of Legends, Sejuani is a central figure in the ongoing conflict in the Freljord. She seeks to unite the tribes of the Freljord under her banner and bring order to the chaotic land. Her fierce determination and unwavering resolve make her a formidable leader, but her methods are often met with resistance from other factions, such as Ashe's Avarosan tribe and Lissandra's Frostguard.

Sejuani's story is intertwined with the larger narrative of the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with rivalries and ancient magic. As players embody Sejuani on the Fields of Justice, they can experience a glimpse of her journey and the challenges she faces in her quest for dominance.

Explore Sejuani's Appearances

Firecracker Sejuani is just one of the many appearances available for Sejuani in League of Legends. Whether you prefer the traditional Winter's Wrath look or want to explore other thematic skins, there is a wide range of options to choose from.

From the fearsome Beast Hunter Sejuani to the elegant Dawnchaser Sejuani, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you want to embody the wild spirit of the Freljord or explore alternative interpretations of the champion, Sejuani's skins provide plenty of variety and customization options.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Sejuani's appearances, be sure to explore this page and immerse yourself in the world of the Winter's Wrath.

Sejuani (Sabretusk Sejuani)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: January 10, 2019

Sejuani, the Winter's Wrath, is a formidable warrior hailing from the icy Freljord. With her trusty boar Bristle by her side, she charges into battle, leading her tribe, the Winter's Claw, with unwavering determination. Sabretusk Sejuani is one of the many skins available for this fierce champion, offering a unique and visually stunning look.

Sabretusk Sejuani Skin Details

Sabretusk Sejuani is a skin that transforms Sejuani into a fearsome hunter of the Freljord. Her armor is adorned with the pelts and bones of her prey, showcasing her dominance over the wild. Bristle, her loyal boar, also receives a makeover, sporting a set of impressive sabre-like tusks.

The skin features new visual effects that perfectly complement the theme. Sejuani's abilities are enhanced with icy blue particles, emphasizing her connection to the frozen tundra. Her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, unleashes a powerful avalanche, freezing enemies in their tracks. The sound effects have also been modified to match the skin's theme, immersing players in the chilling atmosphere of the Freljord.

Furthermore, Sabretusk Sejuani comes with unique recall animation. Sejuani mounts her trusty boar and rides off into the distance, leaving behind a trail of frost. It's a small but delightful addition that adds to the overall experience of playing with this skin.

Sejuani's Story

Sejuani's story is deeply intertwined with the lore of the Freljord. She was born into the Winter's Claw, a tribe that values strength and survival above all else. From a young age, Sejuani displayed exceptional prowess in combat, earning her the respect and admiration of her fellow warriors.

Driven by her desire to unite the Freljord under her rule, Sejuani embarked on a quest to prove her worth. She sought out the legendary boar Bristle, believing that by taming such a powerful creature, she would solidify her position as the rightful leader of the Winter's Claw.

With Bristle by her side, Sejuani quickly rose through the ranks, leading her tribe to victory after victory. She became known as the Winter's Wrath, a title that struck fear into the hearts of her enemies. Sejuani's ultimate goal is to reshape the Freljord, eliminating weakness and forging a new era of strength and dominance.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Sejuani is a tanky jungler who excels at engaging and disrupting the enemy team. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and deals damage to nearby enemies when she uses an ability. This makes her incredibly durable in team fights.

Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge forward, knocking up and damaging enemies in her path. It's a great initiation tool that can catch opponents off guard and set up kills for her team. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, deals damage in an area around her and applies a stack of Frost to enemies hit. Once an enemy has four stacks of Frost, Sejuani can activate her E ability, Permafrost, to stun them.

Sejuani's ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is a game-changer. She throws her flail, creating a large area of effect that freezes enemies hit, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks from her team. It's a powerful crowd control ability that can turn the tide of team fights.

However, Sejuani does have some weaknesses. She relies heavily on her ultimate ability to initiate fights, so if it's on cooldown, she may struggle to engage effectively. Additionally, she lacks strong early game damage, making her vulnerable to aggressive counter-jungling.

Sejuani's Place in the Game

Sejuani is a popular pick in the jungle role due to her ability to initiate team fights and provide crowd control. Her tankiness and crowd control make her a valuable asset to any team composition, especially when paired with champions who can follow up on her engages.

Her versatility allows her to adapt to different playstyles. She can be built as a full tank, soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team, or as a bruiser, dealing significant damage while still being durable. Sejuani's presence in the game is felt in both casual and competitive play, making her a well-rounded and reliable pick.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Sejuani's appearances, including the Sabretusk Sejuani skin. Explore the different looks and unleash the power of the Winter's Wrath in your games!

Sejuani (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Sejuani, the Winter's Wrath, is a formidable warrior hailing from the icy Freljord. As the leader of the Winter's Claw, she commands the loyalty of her tribe and rides into battle on her trusty boar, Bristle. Sejuani's default skin represents her iconic appearance in the League of Legends game, showcasing her fierce and unyielding nature.

The default skin for Sejuani features her in a suit of heavy armor, adorned with fur and ice. She wears a horned helmet that adds to her intimidating presence on the battlefield. Sejuani wields a massive flail, which she swings with incredible strength and precision. Her boar, Bristle, is also decked out in armor, ready to charge into combat alongside his fearless rider.

The color scheme of Sejuani's default skin reflects the icy environment of the Freljord. Shades of blue and white dominate her appearance, symbolizing the harsh and unforgiving nature of her homeland. The intricate details on her armor and weapon showcase the craftsmanship of the Winter's Claw tribe, highlighting their dedication to battle and survival.

Sejuani's default skin perfectly captures her character and role in the game. As a tanky jungler, she excels at initiating team fights and soaking up damage for her team. Her imposing presence and crowd control abilities make her a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. The default skin embodies her fierce determination and unwavering resolve, reflecting her status as a leader and protector of her tribe.

In the lore of League of Legends, Sejuani is a key figure in the ongoing conflict in the Freljord. She seeks to unite the warring tribes under her banner and restore the glory of her people. Sejuani's past is shrouded in mystery, but her unwavering determination and strength have earned her the respect and loyalty of her tribe.

Sejuani's abilities in the game reflect her role as a tanky initiator. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and damage reduction after using an ability. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge forward, damaging and knocking up enemies in her path. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, deals damage in an area around her and applies a slow to enemies hit. Her E ability, Permafrost, allows her to stun enemies who have been slowed by her other abilities. Finally, her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, sends out an icy explosion that freezes enemies in a large area, stunning them and dealing damage.

Sejuani's strengths lie in her ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. Her crowd control abilities make her a valuable asset in team fights, allowing her to lock down priority targets and set up kills for her team. Her tankiness and bonus resistances make her difficult to take down, allowing her to soak up damage and protect her allies. Additionally, her mobility with Arctic Assault enables her to quickly close the gap and initiate fights.

However, Sejuani does have weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. Her early game can be challenging, as she relies on levels and items to become a true threat. She is also vulnerable to crowd control herself, as being locked down can prevent her from engaging or escaping. Additionally, champions with high mobility or ranged abilities can kite her effectively, making it difficult for her to stick to her targets.

In conclusion, Sejuani's default skin represents her iconic appearance as the Winter's Wrath of the Freljord. With her imposing armor, fearsome flail, and loyal boar companion, she embodies the strength and determination of her tribe. As a tanky jungler, she excels at initiating team fights and disrupting the enemy team. Whether charging into battle or leading her tribe to victory, Sejuani is a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Sejuani's appearances, be sure to visit this page.

Sejuani (Bear Cavalry Sejuani)

RP: 975 | Release Date: December 17, 2013

Bear Cavalry Sejuani is a skin for the champion Sejuani in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on December 17, 2013, and can be purchased for 975 RP. It offers a unique and visually appealing look for Sejuani, transforming her into a fearsome warrior riding a majestic armored bear.

The Bear Cavalry Sejuani skin features several notable changes to Sejuani's appearance. Firstly, her armor is upgraded to a more regal and imposing design, adorned with fur and intricate details. She also wields a powerful lance, replacing her usual flail, further emphasizing her role as a mounted warrior. However, the most striking change is the addition of her loyal bear companion, which is now fully armored and ready for battle.

The armored bear is a central aspect of the Bear Cavalry Sejuani skin. It is beautifully crafted with intricate armor plating and a menacing presence. The bear's eyes glow with an otherworldly blue hue, adding an extra touch of mystique to the skin. Together, Sejuani and her bear create an intimidating duo on the battlefield, striking fear into the hearts of their enemies.

Sejuani, the Winter's Wrath, is a powerful and resilient champion in League of Legends. She hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with rival tribes and ancient conflicts. Sejuani is the leader of the Winter's Claw tribe, known for their fierce determination and unwavering strength.

As a champion, Sejuani excels in crowd control and disruption. Her abilities allow her to charge into the midst of enemy teams, stunning and slowing her foes while providing valuable utility to her allies. Sejuani's ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is particularly devastating, as it can immobilize multiple enemies, setting up opportunities for her team to secure kills and turn the tide of battle.

Sejuani's past in the game has seen her undergo several changes and updates. Originally released in 2012, she received a visual and gameplay update in 2013, which included the release of the Bear Cavalry Sejuani skin. This update aimed to enhance her thematic identity as a fierce warrior of the Freljord, while also improving her gameplay mechanics to make her a more viable and engaging champion to play.

In the game, Sejuani is often played as a jungler or a tank in the top lane. Her ability to initiate fights and soak up damage makes her a valuable asset to any team composition. With the Bear Cavalry Sejuani skin, players can not only enjoy the benefits of playing Sejuani but also experience the thrill of commanding an armored bear into battle.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Sejuani, including the Bear Cavalry Sejuani skin. Whether you're a fan of Sejuani or simply appreciate the unique aesthetics of the Bear Cavalry skin, this page is your go-to resource for all things Sejuani.

Sejuani (Traditional Sejuani)

RP Cost: 520

Release Date: December 14, 2010

Traditional Sejuani is a skin for the champion Sejuani in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on December 14, 2010, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 520 RP. It offers players a unique and nostalgic look for Sejuani, showcasing her original design and bringing back memories of the early days of League of Legends.

The Traditional Sejuani skin is a throwback to the original appearance of Sejuani when she was first introduced to the game. It features Sejuani in her classic armor, riding her trusty boar Bristle into battle. The skin retains the icy blue color scheme and rugged look that fans of Sejuani have come to love.

With Traditional Sejuani, players can experience the thrill of playing as the original version of this fierce and powerful champion. The skin pays homage to Sejuani's roots and allows players to relive the early days of League of Legends when she first made her debut.

Sejuani, the Winter's Wrath, is a formidable champion in the game. She is a tanky jungler who excels at initiating team fights and disrupting the enemy team. With her icy abilities and powerful boar mount, Sejuani is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Sejuani's lore is deeply rooted in the icy Freljord region of Runeterra. She hails from a tribe called the Winter's Claw, known for their resilience and strength. Sejuani is a fierce warrior who seeks to unite the tribes of the Freljord under her banner, believing that only through strength and conquest can her people survive the harsh winters.

In the game, Sejuani's abilities reflect her icy nature and her role as a tank. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus armor and magic resist, making her even more durable in combat. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge forward, damaging and knocking up enemies in her path. Her W ability, Winter's Wrath, deals damage in an area around her and applies a frost debuff to enemies, slowing them down. Her E ability, Permafrost, can be used to stun enemies who are already affected by the frost debuff. Finally, her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, sends out a freezing wave that stuns enemies in a large area, setting up her team for devastating follow-up attacks.

Sejuani's strengths lie in her ability to initiate team fights and lock down high-priority targets. Her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, is a game-changer and can single-handedly turn the tide of a battle. With her tankiness and crowd control abilities, Sejuani is a great pick for players who enjoy playing a frontline role and setting up their team for success.

However, Sejuani does have some weaknesses. She relies heavily on her ultimate ability to engage fights, so if it is on cooldown or misses its mark, she can be less effective. Additionally, Sejuani's early game can be challenging, as she requires time to scale and become a threat. She is also vulnerable to champions who can kite her or deal high amounts of damage from a distance.

Sejuani has had a significant impact on the game since her release. Her unique playstyle and powerful crowd control abilities have made her a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. She has received several balance changes and updates over the years to ensure that she remains a viable and balanced champion.

If you want to learn more about Sejuani and her various appearances in the game, you can find more information and videos on her champion page. Whether you prefer the classic look of Traditional Sejuani or want to explore her other skins, Sejuani offers a thrilling and immersive gameplay experience for players who enjoy tanky champions with strong initiation and crowd control abilities.

In the game, Sejuani's abilities reflect her role as a tank and initiator. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and damage reduction. Sejuani, as a champion, has a rich lore within the League of Legends universe. She hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land where tribes vie for power and survival. A Short Narrative: Sejuani's Journey

Sejuani hails from the icy lands of the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving region where strength and survival are paramount. As a young warrior, she was determined to unite the divided tribes of the Freljord under her banner and restore the glory of her people. With her indomitable spirit and unwavering resolve, Sejuani embarked on a journey that would shape her destiny.

Throughout her adventures, Sejuani faced numerous challenges and encountered formidable foes. She clashed with Ashe, the Frost Archer, who believed in a more peaceful approach to leadership. Despite their differences, Sejuani respected Ashe's strength and recognized her as a worthy adversary. Their encounters would shape the future of the Freljord and test Sejuani's resolve.

Sejuani's strength lies in her ability to lead and inspire her allies. She is a tanky champion who excels in initiating team fights and disrupting the enemy's positioning. Her passive ability, Fury of the North, grants her bonus resistances and crowd control reduction, making her a formidable frontline presence. Her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, freezes enemies in a large area, allowing her team to follow up with devastating attacks.

However, Sejuani also has her weaknesses. She lacks mobility compared to other champions, making her susceptible to kiting and crowd control. Additionally, her damage output is not as high as some other champions, relying more on her crowd control and tankiness to contribute to team fights. Proper positioning and coordination with her team are crucial for Sejuani to maximize her impact on the battlefield.

In the world of League of Legends, Sejuani holds a significant place as one of the iconic champions from the Freljord. Her story and journey have captivated players, and her gameplay offers a unique and strategic experience. Whether charging into battle atop her loyal boar or freezing enemies in their tracks, Sejuani's presence is felt on the Rift.

Solar Eclipse Sejuani: A Cosmic Transformation

Clad in shimmering armor adorned with constellations and glowing runes, Sejuani radiates the power of the sun and stars. Sejuani: The Winter's Wrath

Sejuani's story within the League of Legends universe is one of strength, resilience, and a relentless pursuit of power. Born into the Winter's Claw tribe, Sejuani was raised to believe that only the strong survive. Determined to unite the Freljord under her banner, she embarked on a quest to prove her worth and claim her place as the leader of her tribe.

Sejuani's strengths lie in her ability to initiate team fights and soak up damage for her team. With her passive ability, Fury of the North, she gains bonus resistances and deals damage to nearby enemies with her basic attacks. Her Q ability, Arctic Assault, allows her to charge into the fray, knocking up and damaging enemies in her path. Winter's Wrath, her W ability, deals area-of-effect damage and applies a frost debuff to enemies, slowing them down and making them vulnerable to her other abilities. Permafrost, her E ability, detonates the frost debuff, dealing damage and stunning enemies. Finally, her ultimate ability, Glacial Prison, sends out an icy shockwave that freezes enemies in a large area, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.

However, Sejuani does have weaknesses that can be exploited by her opponents. Her early game can be challenging, as she relies on levels and items to become a formidable tank. Additionally, her crowd control abilities have relatively long cooldowns, making her vulnerable to counter-attacks if she misses her crucial abilities. Proper positioning and coordination with her team are essential for Sejuani to maximize her impact in team fights.

In the world of League of Legends, Sejuani is a popular pick in the jungle role due to her ability to initiate fights and provide crowd control for her team. Her tankiness and disruptive abilities make her a valuable asset in team compositions that rely on engaging and locking down the enemy team. With the Solar Eclipse Sejuani skin, players can now bring a cosmic flair to their battles in the Freljord.
